Curse.Description: Cannot use Humanity to heal in the next fight.
Must wear Calamity Ring during the next fight.
Can only wear one ring in the next fight.
Cannot use any consumeables in the next fight.
Cannot wield anything in Left Hand in the next fight.
Must wear the Symbol of Avarice in the next fight.
Cannot use any Sorcery, Pyromancy or Miracles in the next fight.
If the next fight is not won with a backstab, all rewards are forfeited.
If the next fight is not won through fall damage, all rewards are forfeited.
Any Equipment in a left handed slot is broken.
Any Equipment in a right handed slot is broken.
Any Equipment in both left and right handed slots are broken.
Any ring in the first ring slot is broken.
Any ring in the second ring slot is broken.
Equipment in Helm slot is broken.
Equipment in Body slot is broken.
Equipment in Hand slot is broken.
Equipment in Legs slot is broken.
Lose 5 Humanity.
Forget the Sorcery, Pyromancy or Miracle you have currently selected.
Must have Dragon Head Stone activated for the next fight.
Must be fully transformed into Dragon Form for the next fight.
